channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Windows BackupProxies migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 3, 06:00 UTC  -  Jun 7, 12:00 UTC

May 23, 14:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Veeam Backup offer.

Start time : 03/06/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 07/06/2024 12:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for Veeam BackupProxy appliance.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Cloud Connect operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 3, 06:00 UTC  -  Jun 7, 19:00 UTC

May 21, 22:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

Start time : 03/06/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 07/06/2024 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Veeam Cloud connect will be unavailable during the maintenance and each object(Virtual machine) being migrated will be unavailable for 2 hours during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be migrating our Veeam Cloud Connect product in Canada and Europe.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 27, 06:00 UTC  -  May 31, 16:00 UTC

May 22, 16:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 27/05/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 31/05/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for VMware vCenter Server services. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Storage incident notification
item.description:
May 19, 15:06 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/05/2024 11:55 UTC
End Time : 19/05/2024 14:57 UTC
User impact : Backup and restore services for customers on storage server149 were temporarily unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2b
Root cause :Electrical issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 19, 13:35 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 19/05/2024 11:55 UTC
User impact : Backup and restore services for customers on storage server149 are temporarily unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2b
Ongoing Actions: Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Storage incident notification
item.description:

End Time : 19/05/2024 07:00 UTC

Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2b

item.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Hosts unreachable incident notification
item.description:
May 10, 20:48 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/05/2024 13:50 UTC
End Time : 10/05/2024 20:45 UTC
User impact : Some hosts in these racks R831B25, R831B26 were temporarily unreachable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Disjunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 10, 15:48 UTC
Update - Most of the affected hosts are back to normal.
Our technical teams are working on those that remain.

May 10, 14:33 UTC
Identified - Start time: 10/05/2024 13:50 UTC
User impact : Some hosts in these racks R831B25, R831B26 are currently unreachable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Disjunction
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix.
update will be made when significant progress is made.

May 10, 14:25 UTC
Investigating - We have detected an issue on our infrastructure. We will update informations when we will have more details.
